授業目的: The purpose of this course is to help doctoral candidates develop their academic writing skills prior to the submission of their theses.
到達目標: Depending on student requirements, three or four sessions are scheduled during the spring semester to cover such topics as methodology, planning, referencing and common writing errors.
授業方法: Individual tutorials are given in English.

トピック.授業計画1: Individual tutorials are arranged in my office to cover all the main aspects of thesis writing.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to submit an abstract of their thesis detailing its methodological approach, together with an overall plan.
